div.p: Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 800 × 480 pixels, file size: 432 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

div.div: English: Flag of Trinidad and Tobago
Esperanto: Flago de Trinidado kaj Tobago
Español: Bandera de Trinidad y Tobago
Gaeilge: Bratach na Tríonóide agus Tobága
Kreyòl ayisyen : Drapo Trinidad ak Tobago
Italiano: Bandiera di Trinidad e Tobago
日本語: トリニダード・トバゴの国旗
Nederlands: Vlag van Trinidad en Tobago
Papiamentu: Bandera di Trinidad i Tobago
Português: Bandeira de Trindade e Tobago

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

div.p: The width of the white and black stripes together is 1/5 of the length, the ratio of the white and black stripes is 1:4:1 (see [1]). This means:

ul.li: The angle between the stripes and the horizontal lines is
The distance between the top left corner of the flag and the top left corner of the black stripe is

dl.dd: where w = width of the flag. All other dimensions can easily be derived from this.
